item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 15, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Jane Street's Figgie card game (165 points | 21 comments)
2. What situations in classical physics are non-deterministic? (26 points | 26 comments)
3. Apache Iceberg now supports geospatial data types natively (75 points | 8 comments)
4. The 20 year old PSP can now connect to WPA2 WiFi Networks (289 points | 95 comments)

7. A decade later, a decade lost (2024) (427 points | 120 comments)

20. The largest sofa you can move around a corner (169 points | 77 comments)
21. The Iconic 3DBenchy Enters the Public Domain (164 points | 13 comments)
22. Bookshop.org launches Kindle alternative, sends e-book sales to local bookstores (128 points | 46 comments)
23. Recurring checklists using Org Mode in Emacs (43 points | 2 comments)

25. TeX and Typst: Layout Models (2024) (209 points | 32 comments)

27. Sunsetting Create React App (100 points | 94 comments)
28. Goku Flow Based Video Generative Foundation Models (20 points | 3 comments)
29. Show HN: Transform your codebase into a single Markdown doc for feeding into AI (254 points | 158 comments)
30. Can We Trust AI Benchmarks? A Review of Current Issues in AI Evaluation (16 points | 2 comments)
